description: Installation of condenser unit to accomodate use of the unit as retail space (Use Class E)
decision_conditions: <p>Prior to commencement of the development, details of anti-vibration measures shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Council.&nbsp; The measures shall ensure that the hereby approved plant and associated equipment are mounted with proprietary anti-vibration isolators and fan motors are vibration isolated from the casing and adequately silenced.&nbsp; Approved details shall be implemented prior to occupation of the development and thereafter be permanently retained.</p><p>Reason: To safeguard the amenity of neighbouring residents and the area generally.</p>

<p>The external sound level emitted from there hereby approved development shall be lower than the lowest existing background sound level by at least 10dBA. The assessment shall be made in accordance with BS 4142:2014 at the nearest and/or most affected noise sensitive premises, with all machinery operating together at maximum capacity.&nbsp; The plant shall be serviced regularly in accordance with manufacturer’s instructions and as necessary to ensure that the requirements of the condition are maintained. If at any time the plant is determined by the Local Planning Authority to be failing to comply with this condition, it shall be switched off and not used again until it is able to comply.</p><p>Reason: To ensure that the amenity of occupiers of the development site/ surrounding premises is not adversely affected by noise from machinery and equipment</p>

The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.


REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.


REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.
subdivision_of_building: Rear elevation at ground floor level
